title: Husband and 5 other men charged with sex offences against ex-wife

content:

content:

title: Barry Manilow to undergo surgery for 'cancerous spot' on lung
description: Manilow said it was "pure luck" that doctors found the spot early when he had an MRI scan following weeks of bronchitis.
content:
Singer-songwriter Barry Manilow has revealed he will undergo surgery to remove a cancerous spot on his lung.
Manilow, one of the biggest stars of the 70s and 80s, said it was "pure luck" that doctors found the spot early when he had an MRI following ... [1272 chars]

title: Aden Flint: Walsall secured valuable point in big period
description: Walsall defender Aden Flint praises his side for securing draw at promotion rivals Notts County despite illness in camp.
content:
